subject: Officiating (Sports)
Hockey, Ice
Prudential Center (Newark)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. still has goal judges, but they do not all still sit in Plexiglas boxes behind the end boards in back of the goals. In many arenas, the judges sit in the lower stands or in press boxes.
snippet: The N.H.L. still has goal judges, but they do not all still sit in Plexiglas boxes behind the end boards in back of the goals. In many arenas, the judges sit in the lower stands or in press boxes.
